Description.Text:
Property Location
A stay at Alexandra Place places you in the heart of Bendigo, walking distance from Golden Dragon Museum and Ulumbarra Theatre. This 4-star motel is within close proximity of Bendigo Library and Rosalind Park.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and LCD televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and digital programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as minibars and sofa beds.

Dining
Take advantage of the motel's room service (during limited hours).

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include express check-in, express check-out, and luggage storage. Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 10 AM
Take advantage of the motel's room service (during limited hours).
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and digital programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as minibars and sofa beds.

A stay at Alexandra Place places you in the heart of Bendigo, walking distance from Golden Dragon Museum and Ulumbarra Theatre. This 4-star motel is within close proximity of Bendigo Library and Rosalind Park.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Golden Dragon Museum - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Ulumbarra Theatre - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Bendigo Library - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Rosalind Park - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Hargreaves Mall - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Bendigo Art Gallery - 1 km / 0.6 mi
The Capital-Bendigo's Performing Arts Centre - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Queen Elizabeth Oval - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Discovery Science and Technology Centre - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Central Deborah Gold Mine - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Bendigo Club - 2.5 km / 1.6 mi
Bendigo Fun Factory - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Quarry Hill Golf Club - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Schweppes Centre Stadium - 3.4 km / 2.1 mi
Bendigo Botanic Gardens - 3.9 km / 2.4 mi

The preferred airport for Alexandra Place is Melbourne, VIC (MEL-Tullamarine) - 113.4 km / 70.5 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
